mapper.select: select b.name, b.phone, b.account_id , a.lecture_register_id ,c.center_id from lecture_register a, member b, open_course c, subject d , education_center e , center_classroom f where a.account_id = b.account_id and c.subject_id = d.subject_id and a.open_course_id = c.open_course_id and c.center_id = e.center_id and c.center_classroom_id = f.center_classroom_id and a.open_course_id = #{open_course_id} and a.lecture_register_code = '4'
mapper.insert: insert into attendance (lecture_register_id, attendance_code,attendance_date, center_id, open_course_id) values (#{lecture_register_id},#{attendance_code},#{attendance_date},#{center_id},#{open_course_id}) on DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE lecture_register_id = #{lecture_register_id} , attendance_code=#{attendance_code}, attendance_date=#{attendance_date},center_id=#{center_id},open_course_id=#{open_course_id}
